abstract: Delaware Attorney General Beau Biden accuses Merscorp, operator of national mortgage registry used by banks, of deceptive practices that hide information from borrowers.
snippet: Delaware’s attorney general said Merscorp’s mortgage registry database obscured data and made it difficult for homeowners to fight foreclosures.
lead_paragraph: Delaware’s attorney general said Merscorp’s mortgage registry database obscured data and made it difficult for homeowners to fight foreclosures.

headline.seo: Delaware Suit Accuses Merscorp of Deception in Mortgage Registry
